product.title: 2,7 mm Basic Cable – Black
product.short_description: The 2,7 mm Basic Cable is a quality cable that works for ALL robot mower installations.
product.long_description: The 2,7 mm Basic Cable is a quality cable that works for ALL robot mower installations. The cable is insulated with hard plastic to protect the wire. It is still very flexible and can, therefore, be laid with all cable machines. The cable comes in high-quality wooden spools for 800 and 1000 meters. Available on drums of 800 and 1000 meters with a diameter of 2,7 mm. Fits any robotic lawn mower All cables come with meter marking! Thickness 2,7 mm Basic cable with a more stable insulation than the original plastic. Cable roll size: 800/1000 Meters – the 1000 meter roll will fit all professional cable machines. Used for the installation of robot mowers, boundary loop, boundary cable, search cable, look-up loop, guide-wire and much more. For all Husqvarna Automower models such: 105 305 308 310 315 315X 320 330X 420 430X 440 450X 520 550 G2 G3 210C 220AC 230ACX 260ACX 265ACX SH Solar Hybrid For all Gardena models such as: R38Li R40Li R45Li R50Li R70Li R75Li R80Li R100Li R130Li R160Li R165 R180 Sileno Sileno+ Sileno City smart Sileno City smart Sileno smart Sileno+ For all McCulloch such as: ROB R600 and R1000 Bosch Indego 800 1000 1100 1200 connect WorX Landroid For all Robomow-autonomous models such as: MC300, MC500, MC1000, MC1200, MS-Serie, RL-series, RM-Series. For all Ambrogio models such as: L200-250 -Robot models For All Stihl/Viking iMow robots For All Honda Miimo robots
